channel.title: Project: RuneScape Remade
channel.description:
I'm done with this project, download it here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,513571.0.html
Hello everyone, this is my project. Before I start let me say that I have absolutely zero experience in Java. :( I've taken one year of python in high-school, and that is all. I'm doing this project for fun to see what I can make of it. ;D
-DEVELOPERS NEEDED(As long as you have some experience you can help me with repetitive stuff like adding drops)
It is highly unlikely that is project will succeed, so far, I did all of this in one day. It goes to show you how easy it is to "claim" that you are making a remake.
I bet you can't guess the source :trollface:
[b]Update Log:[/b] August 12th: Downloaded a source. Fixed lots of combat bug fixes. Cleaned the source up. Added lots of F2p spawns. Added most F2p shops. Starting rewriting/tweaking the F2p skills. Cleaned client. Worked on fire-making, and magic, and ranging system.
August 13th: Adjusted exp rates. Added more monster spawns, added 90% draynor spawns. Added all shops in lumby, alhkarid, and varrock. Looked through server files to familiarize myself. Added drops to a few npcs in lumby. Added more food.
[b]Media[/b] All screenshots are from day one, I will update the thread when I do more.
Login [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/k1LjH.png[/img] Equipment & Items [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RAG7H.png[/img] Woodcutting [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/V33R8.png[/img] Fletching [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/S44q3.png[/img] Mining [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wAXy5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yh3Ha.png[/img] Cooking/Fires [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wWmIK.png[/img] Banking [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zxA8i.png[/img] Combat [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0Y5Vv.png[/img] Fishing [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hvSnj.png[/img] Alching [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cNdXE.png[/img] Shops [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mkK1E.png[/img] Equip Screen [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/q2jla.png[/img]
Videos: 5 Minute Overview [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-zLJrB3ryxs]www.youtube.com/watch?v=-zLJrB3ryxs[/url]
[b]Programmers:[/b] Me 100% Credits to everyone I've leeched from.
This is partly a joke, but also I'm messing around so I created a project thread for fun.

item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=".cLass, post:23, topic:409676"][quote author=MarcelScapes link=topic=510952.msg3707804#msg3707804 date=1313149960]
It is highly unlikely that is project will succeed, so far, I did all of this in one day. It goes to show you how easy it is to “claim” that you are making a remake.
[/quote]
You made this shit in a day? It took Vault 3 months to change source, Lol.[/quote]

LOL ikr, took vault a shit load of time to do it, I’m not gonna bad mouth vault cause his rs remake is going okay.

As marcel said, and most of do know, pi’s are very easy to code, i’m not sure what vault is using, but pi’s are simple enough :3.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @MarcelScapes MarcelScapes
item.description:
@MarcelScapes wrote:

Yes, I coded all that stuff in a day. Keep in mind that [PI] made it very easy to do that all in one day. A lot of stuff such as combat equipment, etc all comes with the source.

Update for you guys:

T65yz.png781×562

Spent 2 hours completing 90% of all f2p shops, varrock, falador, lumbridge, port sarim, are all 100% complete.

@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“TheHolyGrail, post:17, topic:409676”][quote author=Frell link=topic=510952.msg3708858#msg3708858 date=1313210868]
seeing that old dragon armor almost made me tear up

Why don’t all you remake guys join into one huge team and actually get shit done?
[/quote]I would be up for it, but people are greedy. Most do it for the money, and they don’t want to share. :P[/quote]

I would join in on it too, I got nothing better to do, I’ve coded a few old school projects (not releasing cause it’ll make me tear up just seeing someone leech my hard work :3)

And I totally agree with you saying that people are greedy.

item.title: Project: RuneScape Remade
item.dc:creator: @MarcelScapes MarcelScapes
item.description:
@MarcelScapes wrote:

I completely agree with you guys, however a lot of the people who are doing remakes are doing different revisions . Also, a lot of them don’t get along… you would have to get a group of people who agreed with each other, and got along. Which is kinda hard but if you could, it might work. Group projects often fail too though.

Anyway I think I’m the only remake currently using [PI], which is actually a better source than people think. [PI] doesn’t mean DSPK, [PI] is based off riotscape by lmctruck. It’s not as good as Hyperion but it’s easier so the work goes faster and it’s a big step up from delta. Like I said I’m looking for developers/just people who are willing to help test. Send me a pm if your interested.

Ohh, I fixed the link to the YouTube video so you can check the video out now.

Read full topic

another one to make them work
another for special type of fishing

3-4 guys per skill could actually remake a successful 06 runescape.

item.title: Project: RuneScape Remade
item.dc:creator: @MarcelScapes MarcelScapes
item.description:
@MarcelScapes wrote:

Thanks, source is… Project Insanity. Yes Insanity is associated with crappy servers now adays but I chose it as a base because it comes with a great base for combat and has a lot more done and I have like I said, zero Java experience so I need all the help I can get by looking at the code already there, and let’s face it not many remakes have had better combat systems than project insanity.

The skills in PI are complete shit, they are half-assed. I will be re-writing all of them. Don’t worry.

Also, if you want to help me in any way… it’s always fun to be working with people. Right now I’m doing it by myself. So I’m up for testers/bug finders/developers.

Read full topic
